TopicTitle: Cant undock after loading quick save

Articles.Content:
after loading quick save I cant seem to undock anymore. I tried to undock but the viacles are still atacked and I can cantrol them both. And after rebooting KSP 2 it even got wierder. I have some video's linked to show what happend

The moment when it happend

This happend after restarting KSP2
Also had that Problem. I had another Dockingport (Large) on that craft, when I decupled that the Medium dockingports worked agian. Seems to be related to craft State?

I also just had a craft reported as exploded and camera drifting away, though visually the craft still seemed docked. 
Standard capsule with crew can fuel and rocket; single stage only unless you count 2 sets of parachutes...then 3 stages.

Connected to a fuel station 200k in LKO. Pair of standard clamp-o-trons.  Kind of a bugger.  I guess I'll send up another ship to rescue the kerbals and leave the existing docked for a few weeks.

Closed out game; re-launched it...still explodes. 

Edited February 28, 2023 by skogs
added bit about restarting game

11 minutes ago, skogs said:

I also just had a craft reported as exploded and camera drifting away, though visually the craft still seemed docked. 

As soon as you click undock timewarp, the craft may clip into each other but will drift free. Hope this is fixed soon!
